attributes.action: Use a recipricol system for border control for all AMERICANS entering the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the American government is about to force the European Union to give more personal information on all travelers entering the  USA, the UK should do the exact same and require all Americans entering the UK to give fingerprints and a face picture on entering our borders, as well as their own personal data. This way we will stop the Americans asking for more and more personal information which they will unless our "American Loving Non Elected European Commission" has an about face and decides to say NO to the growing American demands.
